name: Magic Ben - In the Platformer World
name_original: Magic Ben - In the Platformer World
description:
Magic Ben, the world-famous magician, was having a bad day like no other!
Right before performing a great show, he gets kidnapped and thrown off unto rocky, sky high platforms in the middle of nowhere! And if that wasn't bad enough, he finds out that his arch-nemesis Aegenbald, who was thought to be dead for many years, is alive!

But the surprises don't end here! What seems to be a simple platformer game, quickly turns out to be a short, fun, interactive and story driven Puzzle Adventure Game!

Programmed in pygame/Python!
For Windows only.

Follow me to get notified when new games come out!
Enjoy!
